key.name: dark-mode
key.description: Whether the application should request the dark theme variant.

key.name: contest-mode
key.description: Enables the simplified contest mode interface.

key.name: my-callsign
key.description: The user's primary amateur radio callsign (used for MY_CALL, STATION_CALLSIGN, OPERATOR).

key.name: my-gridsquare
key.description: The user's 4 or 6 character Maidenhead grid square locator (used for MY_GRIDSQUARE).

key.name: my-latitude
key.description: The user's latitude in decimal degrees (N positive, S negative) (used for MY_LAT).

key.name: my-longitude
key.description: The user's longitude in decimal degrees (E positive, W negative) (used for MY_LON).

key.name: my-cq-zone
key.description: The user's CQ Zone (used for MY_CQ_ZONE). 0 if unknown.

key.name: my-itu-zone
key.description: The user's ITU Zone (used for MY_ITU_ZONE). 0 if unknown.

key.name: my-dxcc
key.description: The user station's DXCC entity code (used for MY_DXCC). 0 if unknown.

key.name: my-country
key.description: The user's country name (used for MY_COUNTRY).

key.name: my-state
key.description: The user's state or province abbreviation (e.g., CA, NY, ON) (used for MY_STATE).

key.name: my-county
key.description: The user's county, format: STATE,COUNTY (e.g., CA,SANTA CLARA) (used for MY_CNTY).

key.name: my-rig
key.description: Description of the user's equipment (used for MY_RIG).

key.name: my-antenna
key.description: Description of the user's antenna (used for MY_ANTENNA).

key.name: my-timezone
key.description: The IANA time zone name (e.g., 'America/New_York') for displaying local time. Leave empty to use system default.

key.name: contest-band
key.description: The default band to pre-fill when using contest mode logging.
